nodes.comment:
‚õîÔ∏è When something goes wrong


This workflow is executed when there's an unexpected error in one of the other workflows.

You can use this to inform the user of the situation before ending the conversation.
nodes.name: Comment1

text.staticValue: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later

nodes.comment:
‚åõÔ∏è When conversation times out


This workflow is executed when the conversation times out before it had time to flow to an End Node.

The Timeout Delay is configurable in the Chatbot Settings.

You can use this to inform the user of the situation before ending the conversation.
nodes.name: Comment1

nodes.comment:
üëã Before Conversation Ends


This workflow is executed when right before the conversation Ends Explicitly.

An Explicit Ending happens when a workflow transitions on an End Node.
nodes.name: Comment1

messages.content:
Answer the following prompt in under {{GENERATION_LENGTH}} completion tokens.
Prompt:{{GENERATION_INPUT}}
You are ExtractGPT and your only goal is to generate useful content in JSON format for developers to parse and use. You don't know any other language than JSON.

```typescript
/** The user answer to the question "Which one would you like? Choices: [ 1) Red Apple, 2) Yellow Apple, 3) Dark Banana ]" */
interface Output = { choice: {{CHOICES_TYPINGS}} }
```

Here is a conversation between me and a user. Transcript:
"""
(...)
agent: Which one would you like? Choices: [ 1) Red Apple, 2) Yellow Apple, 3) Dark Banana ]
user: I will go with the second one please
"""

Now, forget about the previous transcripts. These were just examples, don't consider those as valid transcripts for this new task.

###

The current Date is {{CURRENT_DATE_TIME}}.

At this point of the conversation, I need require the user to fill the output in following JSON output to complete the task.
If more than one property, try to extract each of them the best you can.

```typescript
/** The user answer to the question "{{QUESTION}}" */
interface Output = { choice: {{CHOICES_TYPINGS}} }
```

Here is a conversation between me and a user. Transcript:
"""
(...)
{{TRANSCRIPT}}
"""

In the last user message, here are the entities found:
"""
ENTITIES_IDENTIFIED
"""

I need you to extract from the conversation transcript above the values the user has provided.
If the user has not provided the information I need, I need you to set the value of the missing answer properties to null.
Have some tolerance to typos and variations in how the user selects from the possible values.



Now, please reply to me with the above JSON output and nothing but JSON.
You should not explain your answer and should not talk back to me. Just JSON.
